title: Remote early detection of SARS-CoV-2 infections using a wearable-based algorithm: Results from the COVID-RED study, a prospective randomised single-blinded …
details: LC Zwiers, TB Brakenhoff, BM Goodale, D Veen… - PloS one, 2025
abstract: Background Rapid and early detection of SARS-CoV-2 infections, especially during the pre-or asymptomatic phase, could aid in reducing virus spread. Physiological parameters measured by wearable devices can be efficiently analysed to provide …
